author: Luca Missaglia
description: Sipping through the bitter layer of coffee is a great start to this lightly bitter-sweet aperitivo.
name: Coffee & Tonic
recipeIngredient: 50 ml Italicus or other Rosolio di Bergamotto / bergamot liqueur

recipeInstructions.text: POUR first 2 ingredients into ice-filled glass and briefly stir
LAYER coffee by carefully pouring so sits as a on top of drink
